name: Vive Walker Ski Glides & Covers 4 PCS - Tennis Ball Accessories Sliders for Seniors, Universal, Heavy Duty - Precut Medical Folding Rolling Slider Replacement Feet Coaster Cap Gliders, Durable
short_description: COMPATIBLE WITH ALL WALKERS: Allowing for smooth, easy mobility, the Vive walker ski glides are universally sized to easily attach to all walker styles. The curved ski glides securely slide into place, with a post diameter between 1" - 1 1/8" . Navigate over carpet, tile, pavement or concrete without dragging your walker or using unsightly tennis balls. This set of two walker ski glides also includes two velour glide covers for indoor use.

SUITABLE FOR INDOOR/OUTDOOR USE: Safely maneuver indoors and out with the smooth walker ski glides. Great for concrete sidewalks, pavement and blacktop, the scratch-resistant walker glides provide additional stability on any surface.

CURVED TIPS WITH VELOUR COVERS: The inclined ski tips easily glide over door jams, rugs and from tile to carpet. Two velour glide covers are included for indoor use. These covers provide additional protection against snags and scratches when moving from outdoors to indoors.

DURABLE COMPOSITE GLIDES: Constructed with a strong composite material, the thick walker ski glides are durable for extensive use. The smooth glides reduce noise and will not scratch hard surfaces or snag carpets or rugs.
VIVE GUARANTEE: 60 day unconditional guarantee so you can purchase now with confidence.

name: Walker Coasters 2 Pack| Longer Lasting More Durable Tennis Ball Alternative | Glides Easily Over Hard Surfaces | 2 Count | Storm Gray
short_description: TENNIS BALL ALTERNATIVE: These replacement mobility footpads are cleaner and safer than the average tennis ball. These allow seniors to more easily see in front of them to avoid stumbling or tripping.
GLIDES EASILY OVER HARD SURFACES: The coasters smoothly glide over floors, including tile, linoleum, and carpet. They also work well over the sidewalk, bumps or cracks in concrete, and even doorways.
DURABLE PLASTIC: While a tennis ball collects water and excess debris, both simply slide off these plastic coasters. Protective shields prevent coasters from getting caught or getting stepped on.
EASY-TO-SEE COLOR: You won’t have to worry about losing the walker covers! These pads are a neutral gray, so they won’t look too bright or and embarrassing the elderly or their guardians.
STAYS SNUG: The unique O-rings attached to the bottom help the coasters stay snug to the walker legs in all temperatures. They’re also very lightweight and easy to lift.
product_description: In need of mobility supplies for your grandparents or senior clients? Worried about their safety when using a walker? Walker Coasters make the perfect choice for safely improving mobility! Place the plastic coasters on the legs in front of the wheels to aid in movement. Replace the icky old tennis balls with these plastic walker covers. They are a much cleaner and safer alternative to standard tennis balls stuck to the end of walkers. Where the soft covers of tennis balls tend to grab, especially on rough surfaces such as concrete, Walker Coasters easily glide over them. They work both indoors and outdoors, on various different types of surfaces. The Walker Coasters specifically allow persons to walk more easily over hardwood, rugs, cement, or other flooring. These coasters won’t skid or slide when used, even when used in doorways or thresholds. You won’t need to worry about the covers scratching your new floors either because the plastic is soft enough to avoid damage. The covers include a plastic O-ring to stick to the bottom of the walker leg. These prevent slippage from the walker covers and allow them to fit more securely onto the equipment. The plastic stoppers fit standard 1-inch walker tubing and install easily without the need for tools. They’re also easily removable and can be swapped out with ease. They measure 2.5” in diameter and 1.5” high. This product was made in the USA. Shop handicap equipment for your elderly friends or family members by purchasing the coasters set today!
